title: Hire inputs until MRP equals MFC

content.question: A profit-maximizing firm should hire an input up to the point at which

choices.label: marginal physical product equals marginal revenue product
marginal revenue equals marginal factor cost
marginal revenue product equals marginal revenue
marginal revenue product equals marginal factor cost
marginal physical product equals marginal factor cost

content.answer: marginal revenue product equals marginal factor cost
